title: condoras
author: condoras
content: As the title says, I have Bitcoin and I want 150 EUR PayPal at preev rate 1:1. Trusted members only or members that I have dealt with in the past and I prefer that you go first. Anyone who has the interest to fill this, post here.Thank you in advance.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Since we've already had some smooth trades and I'm currently in need of some satoshis, I'm happy to do this trade with you. Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade with me.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: -doubleU- on June 09, 2022, 07:20:17 PMSince we've already had some smooth trades and I'm currently in need of some satoshis, I'm happy to do this trade with you. Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade with me.No problem, I'm happy to make this trade. My PayPal info was just sent, let me know when you are ready so I can send you the BTC.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Great! I received your Paypal Info and send the Money to the address. Please check your PM for BTC Address Info and send me the Coins soon as possible. I will confirm a succesful trade here, after i received the coins. Thank You!

I can now confirm that I received the coins a few hours ago. Thank you for another quick and smooth trade.Â  Everything is fine and you can lock this thread now.We can do that again at any time if you need a few euros again.
